## What This Site Is

Bitcoin Sovereign Academy is a free, interactive Bitcoin education platform at bitcoinsovereign.academy. It offers 44 hands-on simulations and 6 structured learning paths that teach Bitcoin from first principles through advanced self-custody and privacy techniques. All demos run in the browser — no wallet, no downloads, and no personal information required to start learning.

## Sovereign Network

- **Bitcoin Sovereign Academy** (this site): https://bitcoinsovereign.academy — Bitcoin-specific education
- **Financially Sovereign Academy**: https://financiallysovereign.academy — Personal finance fundamentals
- **The Sovereign Academy** (hub): https://thesovereign.academy — Entry point for both

## Learning Paths (6)

1. **The Curious** (`/paths/curious/`) — Complete beginners, zero to Bitcoin confident
2. **The Hurried** (`/paths/hurried/`) — Get Bitcoin secured in under 1 hour
3. **The Pragmatist** (`/paths/pragmatist/`) — Hands-on learners who learn by doing
4. **The Principled** (`/paths/principled/`) — Theory-first: philosophy, economics, first principles
5. **The Sovereign** (`/paths/sovereign/`) — Advanced: privacy, multisig, node, inheritance
6. **The Builder** (`/paths/builder/`) — Technical developers building on Bitcoin

Key demos at https://bitcoinsovereign.academy/interactive-demos/:

- Bitcoin Unit Converter — BTC, sats, mBTC, fiat
- Mining Simulator — Experience proof-of-work firsthand
- UTXO Visualizer — Understand Bitcoin's transaction model
- Lightning Network Demo — Learn layer-2 payments
- Wallet Security Workshop — Practice wallet setup safely
- Multisig Setup Wizard — Multi-signature security configuration
- Fee Master Tool — Optimize transaction fees
- Money Properties Comparison — Bitcoin vs gold vs fiat vs shells
- Bitcoin Time Machine — Price history and adoption timeline
- Supply Schedule — Visualize the 21M cap and halvings
- Transaction Lifecycle — Trace a transaction from broadcast to confirmation
